model

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Block
      • model.Platform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Platform
extends Block
implements java.io.Serializable
    Platforms for the character to move on. Inherits block.
    Author:
    Alex Addeo, Zion Aranda, Katie Black, Michael Cisternino, Nick Hoffman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Platform

        public Platform(int x,
                int y,
                int initx,
                int inity,
                int width,
                int height,
                ObjectType t,
                RangeType r,
                java.lang.Boolean isVert,
                java.lang.Boolean isHor,
                GameController gc)
        Construtor for platform. Sends everything to the superclass constructor.
        Parameters:
        x - The platform's x position.
        y - The platform's y position.
        initx - The platform's initial x position.
        inity - The platform's initial y position.
        width - The width of the platform.
        height - The height of the platform.
        t - The type of the object.
        r - The distance the platform will move: short, medium, long.
        isVert - If the platform will move vertically when it moves.
        isHor - If the platform will move horizontally when it moves.
        gc - The game controller.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws a rectangle based on the parameters of the platform. If the platform is the final platform of the level, it is colored a different color.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Block
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics to be drawn on.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the platform in the controller. If the platform is the final platform, the next level is called. The final platform rises when the character is on it. Updates the platform based on the direction the view is moving in the controller.
        Specified by:
        update in class Block
